summary: This appears to be a header or reference to a news article from July 26, 2019, about Jeffrey Epstein's life in prison at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. It includes a confidential document identifier and a Latin motto.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the referenced news article about his life behind bars at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: News Article on Epstein's Prison Life
events.description: A news article is published detailing Jeffrey Epstein's life behind bars at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, NY, NY 10007
keyFacts: A news article about Jeffrey Epstein's life in prison was published on July 26, 2019.
Epstein was incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York City.
The document carries a confidential identifier (SDNY_00012944) and a Latin motto: 'Si vis pacem, para bellum' (If you want peace, prepare for war).
